meanings.definition: A very small distance or margin
meanings.sent1: The hairbreadth between the two lines was barely noticeable.
meanings.sent2: She measured the hairbreadth of the gap with a ruler.
meanings.sent3: The hairbreadth difference in their heights made them look like twins.
meanings.sent4: The hairbreadth of time between the lightning and thunder was almost instantaneous.
meanings.sent5: The hairbreadth of space left for the car to park was too tight.

meanings.definition: A very narrow escape or close call
meanings.sent1: His hairbreadth escape from the burning building was miraculous.
meanings.sent2: The hiker's hairbreadth from falling off the cliff was terrifying.
meanings.sent3: The hairbreadth miss of the train made him realize the importance of punctuality.
meanings.sent4: Her hairbreadth from failing the exam motivated her to study harder.
meanings.sent5: The hairbreadth dodge of the falling piano was like something out of a movie.
